verses.name: Jeremiah 46:5
verses.text: Wherefore have I seen them dismayed and turned away back? and their mighty ones are beaten down, and are fled apace, and look not back: for fear was round about, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 46:6
verses.text: Let not the swift flee away, nor the mighty man escape; they shall stumble, and fall toward the north by the river Euphrates.

verses.name: Jeremiah 46:7
verses.text: Who is this that cometh up as a flood, whose waters are moved as the rivers?
